Hi there, I'm David Sorge!

I'm an apprentice sociologist (aka doctoral candidate) at the University of Pennsylvania. I study conflict escalation, propagation, de-escalation, and resolution in South Asia.

A key question that drives me: "How can violence be non-violently constrained?"

Read more about me...
